/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/Project1.dir/src/BasicTutorial1.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Project1.dir/src/GameObject.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Project1.dir/src/Ball.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Project1.dir/src/EventManager.cpp.o  -o Project1 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libOgreBites.so.1.11.3 /usr/local/lib/libOgreHLMS.so.1.11.3 /usr/local/lib/libOgreMeshLodGenerator.so.1.11.3 /usr/local/lib/libOgreOverlay.so.1.11.3 /usr/local/lib/libOgreProperty.so.1.11.3 /usr/local/lib/libOgreRTShaderSystem.so.1.11.3 /usr/local/lib/libOgreTerrain.so.1.11.3 /usr/local/lib/libOgreVolume.so.1.11.3 /usr/local/lib/libOgrePaging.so.1.11.3 /usr/local/lib/libOgreMain.so.1.11.3 -lpthread
